title: What Home Services Does Servicemen Offer?
content: Helping offers a wide range of services, including cleaning services, plumbing service, electric service, elderly care, appliance repair, handyman services, plumbing, aircon servicing and more.

title: What Payment Methods Are Accepted?
content: We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, online bank transfers, and popular digital wallets.

title: How Can I Contact Servicemen?
content: You can contact us through our customer service hotline, email, or by visiting our official website and using the contact form.

title: What If I Am Not Satisfied with the Service?
content: If you are not satisfied with our service, please contact our customer service team, and we will do our best to resolve the issue.

title: What is Servicemen's timing for providing service?
content: Our service hours are from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Saturday. Emergency services are available 24/7.
